We root for our team butÂ we don'tÂ necessarily have to accept mediocrity the current management brought us. For Fuck sake I jumped out of the couch when Downing smashed that winner against Stoke. Did I care who scored? Fuck, no. All I cared was Liverpool scored.
Finally, what potential do you see in CHAD? Believe it or not, I have not lost hope on Carroll. He just needs 2 wingers who are willing to get their jerseys dirty at the baseline. Downing? Hendo? Their jerseys were never dirtier than Gerrard's.
